name: 陳政翰
objective:
本課程專注於培養學生在數位媒體製作領域的實務能力與創意表達，涵蓋影片剪輯、動態圖像設計及音效處理等核心技能。課程將使用 Adobe Premiere Pro、After Effects 和 Audition 進行專業教學，並模擬真實的影片製作流程。學生將組成小型劇組，從劇本創作、分鏡設計到拍攝、後製，全方位參與短片製作專案。期末舉辦小型影展，呈現學生的創意成果與團隊協作能力。
This course focuses on developing practical skills and creative expression in digital media production. It covers core competencies such as video editing, motion graphics design, and audio processing using Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, and Audition. Students will form small production teams, simulating real-world film production workflows. From scriptwriting and storyboard creation to shooting and post-production, students will fully engage in a short film project. A mini film exhibition will be held at the end of the semester to showcase students’ creative achievements and teamwork.
schedule:
01	課程說明、短片製作規劃、劇組分組與軟體安裝
Course Introduction, Project Planning, Group Formation, Software Setup
02	Premiere Pro 介面介紹與基礎剪輯
Premiere Pro Interface Overview and Basic Editing
03	影片色調修整、動態路徑與字幕、遮罩與去背技巧
Color Grading, Motion Path, and Titles, Masking, and Keying Techniques
04	Premiere Pro 進階：多機位剪輯、音畫同步、高階調色技巧
Advanced Premiere Pro: Multi-camera Editing, Audio-Video Sync, Advanced Color Grading
05	After Effects 介面介紹與基礎動畫操作
After Effects Interface Overview and Basic Animation
06	After Effects 進階：子母圖層與基礎 3D 效果應用
Advanced After Effects: Parenting Layers and Basic 3D Effects
07	After Effects 進階：綠幕特效與跟效果
Advanced After Effects: Chroma Key Effects and Motion Tracking
08	Audition 介面介紹與基本音效處理
Audition Interface Overview and Basic Audio Editing
09	劇本創作與分鏡腳本設計
Scriptwriting and Storyboarding
10	影像拍攝實務：攝影理論與器材操作
Filmmaking Basics: Cinematography Techniques and Equipment Handling
11	影片拍攝
Film Shooting (No Class)
12	影片拍攝
Film Shooting (No Class)
13	初剪與後製初探
First Cut and Initial Post-Production
14	影片精修：後製與音效設計
Advanced Post-Production and Audio Design
15	初剪檢討與修改
Review and Refinement of First Cut
16	最終剪輯與定稿
Final Editing and Fine-Tuning
17	影展準備與影片測試
Film Exhibition Preparation and Testing
18	期末影展與成果發表
Final Film Exhibition and Presentation
scorePolicy:

4. 期末影片 40%
5. 彈性分數 20%
